.. _singularity_sif_new:

singularity sif new
-------------------

Create SIF image

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~


Create a new, empty SIF image.

::

  singularity sif new <sif_path>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::

  sif new image.sif

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for new

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`singularity sif <singularity_sif>` 	 - Manipulate Singularity Image Format (SIF) images
